p:
Considering the antioxidant properties of polyphenols and flavonoids and their reported activity against several enzymes
25
,
26 , the total content of these classes of metabolites was evaluated in all the selected samples ( Table 1). Pearson correlation test was performed to correlate the percentage of IA (showed by extracts at 50 µg/mL) to the phenolic and flavonoids content respectively.
